subject: I'll Have Another (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Breeding of Animals
lead_paragraph: I’ll Have Another, winner of the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness Stakes last month, was sold to Shigeyuki Okada’s Big Red Farm to stand the horse at the beginning of next year’s breeding season.
snippet: I’ll Have Another, winner of the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness Stakes last month, was sold to Shigeyuki Okada’s Big Red Farm to stand the horse at the beginning of next year’s breeding season.
